p.note: The technical services, which are the basis for the marketable services you publish, specify whether the native billing system of or an external billing system is to be used for cost calculation. The information in this chapter only applies to services using the native billing system of . For services using an external billing system, any cost and revenue share calculations, billing, and payment must be covered by this system.

section.p: As a reseller, you are usually entitled to keep a share of the revenue from your customers' service usage. The operator is responsible for defining the revenue shares you can claim. They may be different for each marketplace where you offer services or even for individual services. You are not authorized to change any revenue shares. offers various features that support you in paying the other participating parties their shares of the revenue.
The following sections describe your tasks involved in billing and payment, and in handling revenue shares.
